text: procurement system integration is a
feature for AWS marketplace AWS
marketplace is a curated digital catalog
that makes it easy for customers to find
buy deploy and manage third-party
software and services that customers
need to build solutions and run their
businesses with procurement system
integration customers can connect AWS
marketplace with their procurement
systems as administrators and users you
can access AWS marketplace directly from
the vendor detail page in your
procurement system and search for the
solutions you need once you find the
software you want and click Subscribe
you are redirected back to your
procurement system to complete the
requisition and obtain the necessary
approvals once the requisition is
approved the subscription is executed
and you are notified that it is ready to
deploy directly into an AWS environment
AWS marketplace procurement system
integration helps ensure existing
approval policies are enforced and users
can get access to software quickly in
order to innovate for their business
learn more about procurement system
integration in AWS marketplace
